sentences.en: Applying mosquito coil incense to household use relating to infant brain development is inadvisable.
sentences.cn: 婴幼儿大脑尚未发育完善,因此,家庭不宜使用蚊香等.

sentences.en: Changes in the patient’s condition may make surgery inadvisable.
sentences.cn: 病人病情的变化可能会使其不宜做手术。

sentences.en: For three days, it was inadvisable to leave the harbour.
sentences.cn: 三天之内最好不要驶离海港。
她的情况并不适合动手术.

sentences.en: It is generally inadvisable to eject directly over the area you just bombed.
sentences.cn: 一般来讲,直接降落在刚刚被轰炸过的区域是不明智的.

sentences.en: It is inadvisable to bring children on this trip.
sentences.cn: 这次旅行带孩子不妥当。

sentences.en: It is inadvisable to have too much sugar in your diet.
sentences.cn: 饮食中糖分太多是不可取的.

sentences.en: It is inadvisable to let subconsciousness achieve in satisfied art.
sentences.cn: 作者认为直觉主义放任意识流动,让潜意识支配创作是不足取的.

sentences.en: It is inadvisable to rely only on the litigant lawsuit mode.
sentences.cn: 采用完全的当事人主义诉讼模式是不可取的.

sentences.en: It was thought highly inadvisable for young women to go there alone.
sentences.cn: 人们认为年轻女子独自去那里是极不妥当的.

sentences.en: It's inadvisable to overemphasize this point.
Of course, it is inadvisable to have too many of the latter.
sentences.cn: 游民成分太多, 当然不好.

sentences.en: Running on the ice is inadvisable.
The judge deemed it inadvisable to hear the appeal.
sentences.cn: 法官认为听取这个上诉是不明智的.

sentences.en: The longest call, inadvisable to exceed two generally also hour.
sentences.cn: 最长的拜访, 通常也不宜超过两个小时.

sentences.en: This working method, which is related to that used especially for running movements, is inadvisable.
sentences.cn: 这个“分片包干”的工作方法, 是同那种专搞运动的方法有关, 是不好的.

trans.tran_cn: 不明智的，不可取的，不妥当的，不宜
trans.tran_en: an action that is inadvisable is not sensible
